attachments.fallback: Life from the Loam {1}{G} // Sorcery // Return up to three target land cards from your graveyard to your hand. // Dredge 3 (If you would draw a card, instead you may put exactly three cards from the top of your library into your graveyard. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, draw a card.)
attachments.text:
Sorcery
Return up to three target land cards from your graveyard to your hand.
Dredge 3 _(If you would draw a card, instead you may put exactly three cards from the top of your library into your graveyard. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, draw a card.)_
attachments.title: Life from the Loam {1}{G}
